product_name: Lightspeed Outdoors Stowe 4 Instant Setup Tent - 2014 Overstock
long_description: This 4-person, 3-season tent is as easy to open as an umbrella. With no-thread poles and single-wall construction, it's perfect for those who want protection without the extra baggage of a rainfly.
short_description: This 4-person, 3-season tent is as easy to open as an umbrella. With no-thread poles and single-wall construction, it's perfect for those who want protection without the extra baggage of a rainfly.
